scripts.db:migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/db-manager.js migrate dev
scripts.db:seed:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/db-manager.js seed dev
scripts.db:status:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/db-manager.js status dev
scripts.db:reset:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/db-manager.js reset dev
scripts.db:migrate:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/db-manager.js migrate staging
scripts.db:seed:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/db-manager.js seed staging
scripts.db:status:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/db-manager.js status staging
scripts.db:reset:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node scripts/db-manager.js reset staging
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/db-manager.js migrate prod
scripts.db:status:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node scripts/db-manager.js status prod
scripts.sync:users:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DB_SCHEMA=prod ALLOW_MIGRATIONS=false node src/scripts/runUserSync.js --type=full
